text: I'm using a video field in my custom module that displays the video in a modal. When the modal is triggered, I want the video to play and when the modal is closed, I want to the video to pause. Issue is that the video field renders the video in an iframe (due to Vidyard I'm guessing) and I'm unable to play/pause it with javascript.
Is there a way to change a module field name, or move it into a group, without losing all the content thatâ€™s already entered into that field in all instances live across our website?
test it.  i have a feeling that you will not keep the data
unless you are talking about a label v a name
